solution_line_template: Noah and Ava's zoo entry tickets are ${ticket_cost_per_person} x {num_people} = $<<{ticket_cost_per_person}*{num_people}={total_ticket_cost}>>{total_ticket_cost}.
Their round trip bus fare will be ${bus_fare_one_way_per_person} x {num_people} x {num_trips} = $<<{bus_fare_one_way_per_person}*{num_people}*{num_trips}={total_bus_fare}>>{total_bus_fare}.
Zoo tickets and bus fare will cost ${total_ticket_cost} + ${total_bus_fare} = $<<{total_ticket_cost}+{total_bus_fare}={total_transport_and_entry_cost}>>{total_transport_and_entry_cost}.

For lunch and snacks, they will have ${initial_money} - ${total_transport_and_entry_cost} = $<<{initial_money}-{total_transport_and_entry_cost}={money_left_for_lunch_snacks}>>{money_left_for_lunch_snacks}.
